name: Roo.util.MixedCollection
desc: A Collection class that maintains both numeric indexes and keys and exposes events.

params.name: allowFunctions
params.desc:
True if the addAll function should add function references to the
collection (defaults to false)

params.name: keyFn
params.desc:
A function that can accept an item of the type(s) stored in this MixedCollection
and return the key value for that item.  This is used when available to look up the key on items that
were passed without an explicit key parameter to a MixedCollection method.  Passing this parameter is
equivalent to providing an implementation for the {@link #getKey} method.

config.name: listeners

methods.name: remove
methods.desc: Removed an item from the collection.

params.name: o
params.desc: The item to remove.

returns.desc: The item removed.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Returns the item associated with the passed key or index.

params.name: key
params.desc: The key or index of the item.

returns.desc: The item associated with the passed key.

methods.name: itemAt
methods.desc: Returns the item at the specified index.

params.name: index
params.desc: The index of the item.

methods.name: each
methods.desc:
Executes the specified function once for every item in the collection, passing each
item as the first and only parameter. returning false from the function will stop the iteration.

params.name: fn
params.desc: The function to execute for each item.

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope in which to execute the function.

methods.name: insert
methods.desc: Inserts an item at the specified index in the collection.

params.name: index
params.desc: The index to insert the item at.

params.name: key
params.desc: The key to associate with the new item, or the item itself.

params.name: o
params.desc: (optional) If the second parameter was a key, the new item.

returns.desc: The item inserted.

methods.name: getCount
methods.desc: Returns the number of items in the collection.

returns.desc: the number of items in the collection.

methods.name: clear
methods.desc: Removes all items from the collection.

methods.name: keySort
methods.desc: Sorts this collection by keys

params.name: direction
params.desc: (optional) "ASC" or "DESC"

params.name: fn
params.desc: (optional) a comparison function (defaults to case insensitive string)

methods.name: indexOf
methods.desc: Returns index within the collection of the passed Object.

params.name: o
params.desc: The item to find the index of.

returns.desc: index of the item.

methods.name: clone
methods.desc: Creates a duplicate of this collection

methods.name: containsKey
methods.desc: Returns true if the collection contains the passed Object as a key.

params.name: key
params.desc: The key to look for in the collection.

returns.desc: True if the collection contains the Object as a key.

methods.name: getKey

params.name: o
params.desc: {Object} The item for which to find the key.

returns.desc: The key for the passed item.

methods.name: find
methods.desc:
Returns the first item in the collection which elicits a true return value from the
passed selection function.

params.name: fn
params.desc: The selection function to execute for each item.

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope in which to execute the function.

returns.desc: The first item in the collection which returned true from the selection function.

methods.name: getRange
methods.desc: Returns a range of items in this collection

params.name: startIndex
params.desc: (optional) defaults to 0

params.name: endIndex
params.desc: (optional) default to the last item

returns.desc: An array of items

methods.name: eachKey
methods.desc:
Executes the specified function once for every key in the collection, passing each
key, and its associated item as the first two parameters.

params.name: fn
params.desc: The function to execute for each item.

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope in which to execute the function.

methods.name: indexOfKey
methods.desc: Returns index within the collection of the passed key.

params.name: key
params.desc: The key to find the index of.

returns.desc: index of the key.

methods.name: contains
methods.desc: Returns true if the collection contains the passed Object as an item.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Object to look for in the collection.

returns.desc: True if the collection contains the Object as an item.

methods.name: addAll
methods.desc: Adds all elements of an Array or an Object to the collection.

params.name: objs
params.desc:
An Object containing properties which will be added to the collection, or
an Array of values, each of which are added to the collection.

methods.name: key
methods.desc: Returns the item associated with the passed key.

params.name: key
params.desc: The key of the item.

returns.desc: The item associated with the passed key.

methods.name: item
methods.desc: Returns the item associated with the passed key OR index. Key has priority over index.

params.name: key
params.desc: The key or index of the item.

returns.desc: The item associated with the passed key.

methods.name: filterBy
methods.desc:
Filter by a function. * Returns a new collection that has been filtered.
The passed function will be called with each 
object in the collection. If the function returns true, the value is included 
otherwise it is filtered.

params.name: fn
params.desc: The function to be called, it will receive the args o (the object), k (the key)

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope of the function (defaults to this)

returns.desc: The new filtered collection

methods.name: add
methods.desc: Adds an item to the collection.

params.name: key
params.desc: The key to associate with the item

params.name: o
params.desc: The item to add.

returns.desc: The item added.

methods.name: removeAt
methods.desc: Remove an item from a specified index in the collection.

params.name: index
params.desc: The index within the collection of the item to remove.

methods.name: removeKey
methods.desc: Removed an item associated with the passed key fom the collection.

params.name: key
params.desc: The key of the item to remove.

methods.name: filter
methods.desc: Filter the objects in this collection by a specific property. Returns a new collection that has been filtered.

params.name: property
params.desc: A property on your objects

params.name: value
params.desc:
Either string that the property values 
should start with or a RegExp to test against the property

returns.desc: The new filtered collection

methods.name: last
methods.desc: Returns the last item in the collection.

returns.desc: the last item in the collection..

methods.name: replace
methods.desc: Replaces an item in the collection.

params.name: key
params.desc: The key associated with the item to replace, or the item to replace.

params.name: o
params.desc: {Object} o (optional) If the first parameter passed was a key, the item to associate with that key.

returns.desc: The new item.

methods.name: first
methods.desc: Returns the first item in the collection.

returns.desc: the first item in the collection..

methods.name: sort
methods.desc: Sorts this collection with the passed comparison function

params.name: direction
params.desc: (optional) "ASC" or "DESC"

params.name: fn
params.desc: (optional) comparison function

methods.name: purgeListeners
methods.desc: Removes all listeners for this object

methods.name: on
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this element (shorthand for addListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options
params.desc: (optional)

methods.name: un
methods.desc: Removes a listener (shorthand for removeListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The handler to remove

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: addEvents
methods.desc: Used to define events on this Observable

params.name: object
params.desc: The object with the events defined

methods.name: releaseCapture
methods.desc: Removes all added captures from the Observable.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Observable to release

methods.name: removeListener
methods.desc: Removes a listener

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The handler to remove

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: fireEvent
methods.desc: Fires the specified event with the passed parameters (minus the event name).

params.name: args
params.desc: Variable number of parameters are passed to handlers

returns.desc: returns false if any of the handlers return false otherwise it returns true

methods.name: hasListener
methods.desc: Checks to see if this object has any listeners for a specified event

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The name of the event to check for

returns.desc: True if the event is being listened for, else false

methods.name: capture
methods.desc: Starts capture on the specified Observable. All events will be passed to the supplied function with the event name + standard signature of the event before the event is fired. If the supplied function returns false, the event will not fire.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Observable to capture

params.name: fn
params.desc: The function to call

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the fn

methods.name: addListener
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this component

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options

events.name: remove
events.desc: Fires when an item is removed from the collection.

params.name: o
params.desc: The item being removed.

params.name: key
params.desc: (optional) The key associated with the removed item.

events.name: add
events.desc: Fires when an item is added to the collection.

params.name: index
params.desc: The index at which the item was added.

params.name: o
params.desc: The item added.

params.name: key
params.desc: The key associated with the added item.

events.name: replace
events.desc: Fires when an item is replaced in the collection.

params.name: key
params.desc: he key associated with the new added.

params.name: old
params.desc: The item being replaced.

params.name: new
params.desc: The new item.

events.name: clear
events.desc: Fires when the collection is cleared.
